2025-11-21JUS, IRCCFederal Courts Act
Citizenship Act
Immigration and Refugee Protection ActRules Amending the Federal Courts Rules and the Federal Courts Citizenship, Immigration and Refugee Protection RulesRules Amending the Federal Courts Rules and the Federal Courts Citizenship, Immigration and Refugee Protection Rules in order to (1) simplify the structure for calculation of costs awards by grouping assessable services by type of proceeding, adding new assessable items to reflect current litigation practice, and updating the formatting of the costing tables; and (2) replaces the term “prothonotary” with the term “associate judge” in the Rules and the Immigration Rules.Registration: SOR/2025-0232 Publication Date: 2025-12-03
act:
Federal Courts Act
Citizenship Act
Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
subject: Rules Amending the Federal Courts Rules and the Federal Courts Citizenship, Immigration and Refugee Protection Rules
precis: Rules Amending the Federal Courts Rules and the Federal Courts Citizenship, Immigration and Refugee Protection Rules in order to (1) simplify the structure for calculation of costs awards by grouping assessable services by type of proceeding, adding new assessable items to reflect current litigation practice, and updating the formatting of the costing tables; and (2) replaces the term “prothonotary” with the term “associate judge” in the Rules and the Immigration Rules.
